text: the American nightmare. even achieving the dream doesn’t make you less fucking empty. how anyone can think this is glorification is beyond me, paints a portrait of true betrayal, someone who destroys literally everything that means anything in their lives for the sake of more zeroes at the end of their cheques. there is no weight to any of the materialism by the end, three hours of excess renders you numb to his flashing of another car, more showers of…
